title: Font Pairing
content:
Like fine wine and food, fonts can be paired to enhance or degrade one another. I’m in the process of designing a website and I’d like to use Chaparral Pro Bold for the titles and Avenir for the headings and sub-headings. Let me know what you think of this combo...

Cheers!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090415163004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chap_aven_test_5999.gif)
author: bpotstra

comments.content:
Could you give some more information regarding the website? And about what you are aiming for?

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
